popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on offensive and damaging powers
A mastery path focused on hindering and weakening foes

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Arcane Suppression
data.description: Knocks back all enemies within 20 feet and Silences them, making them unable to use magic for 3 seconds.

data.name: Arcing Power
data.description: Whenever one of your damaging spells hits an enemy, your defensive target will become healed for 25% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Balance Essence
data.description:
Deals 300 Spirit damage to your target, and heals your defensive target for 688 health plus 150% of the damage done.

When casting this ability, you will focus your power into ensuring a hit rather than for maximum damage, causing it to be 20% less likely to be Blocked or Disrupted.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Blessing of Isha
data.description: Heals your entire group for 898 health.

data.name: Blinding Light
data.description: For 5 seconds, your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them will take an additional 1 second to build up all abilities.

data.name: Bolstering Boon
data.description: Boon Of Hysh will now also grant the target 250 points of Morale.

data.name: Boon of Hysh
data.description:
Heals your target for 1258 health.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Cleansing Flare
data.description: Deals 287 Spirit damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them, and knocks them backwards.

data.name: Cleansing Light
data.note: Target must be Hexed or Ailing
data.description: You cleanse an ally's wound and remove one Ailment or Hex. If an effect is removed, your ally will absorb up to 262 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Desperation
data.description: Your healing abilities become 40% more effective when the target is below 25% hit points and Magical Infusion will make its target 25% more receptive to incoming heals.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Dispel Magic
data.description: All of your damaging spells gain a 25% chance to remove 1 Blessing from the victim.  Whenever this happens, they will also suffer an additional 225 Spirit damage.

data.name: Dissipating Energies
data.description: A groupmate becomes surrounded by dangerous energies for 10 seconds.  Every 2 seconds, all enemies within 30 feet of them will suffer 212 Spirit damage.

data.name: Dissipating Hatred
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your healing becomes 20% less effective.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Drain Magic
data.description: You siphon magic from your target, draining 180 Action Points over 9 seconds into yourself.

data.name: Empowered Lores
data.description: Whenever you critically hit with an ability that builds either Force or Tranquility, you will gain one additional point. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Energy of Vaul
data.description:
A wash of power leeches the breath from your target and up to four other enemies within 25 feet of them, dealing 351 Spirit damage to each. Their stolen breath will heal your defensive target and allies within 20 feet of them for 1184 health, plus 50% of the total inflicted damage.

When casting this ability, you will focus your power into ensuring a hit rather than for maximum damage, causing it to be 20% less likely to be Blocked or Disrupted.

data.name: Flames of the Phoenix
data.description: Flames burst from a spot that you select, damaging all enemies within 20 feet of that spot for up to 4 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Forked Lancing
data.description: Radiant Lance will now affect two enemies within 15 feet of your target.

data.name: Funnel Energy
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet have their action point costs increased by 50% for 15 seconds, and all allies in the area have their action point costs reduced by 50% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Funnel Essence
data.description: You focus your powers on your defensive target, restoring up to 1796 health to them over 3 seconds.  This effect will end if you break your concentration, or if you run out of action points.

data.name: Fury of Asuryan
data.description: Deals 434 Spirit damage to a nearby target.

data.name: Gift of Life
data.note:
Force reduces cast time.
Only usable on Dead Players
data.description: Resurrects your target with 20% health.

data.name: Golden Aura
data.description: Shield of Saphery will now grant immunity to Stun and Knockdown effects while active.

data.name: Healing Energy
data.description: Your target regains 370 health immediately, then continues to gain another 445 health over 5 seconds.

data.name: Hurried Restore
data.description: Gift Of Life now resurrects allies instantly, but stuns you for 3 seconds.

data.name: Isha's Encouragement
data.description: If Cleansing Light successfully removes an effect from an ally, then they will also regain 534 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Isha's Ward
data.description: You gain a shield that absorbs 3600 damage for 30 seconds.

data.name: Lambent Aura
data.description: Heals your target for 1700 health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Law of Age
data.description: Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them have their Toughness reduced by 120 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Law of Conductivity
data.description: Deals 980 Spirit damage to your target over 15 seconds.

data.name: Law of Gold
data.description: Deals 396 Spirit damage and silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 5 seconds.

data.name: Magical Infusion
data.description: Infuses protective magic into an ally for 30 seconds, allowing them to recover from near fatal wounds.If the allies health is reduced below 20%, this effect will immediately dispel itself to restore 1033 health if they are still alive. A player may only be affected by a single Magical Infusion at a time.

data.name: Master of Force
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit enemies by 10%.

data.name: Master of Tranquility
data.description: Increases your chance to critically heal by 10%.

data.name: Mistress of The Marsh
data.description: For 10 seconds, all enemies within 20 feet of a spot that you select will have their Initiative reduced by 80 and become snared, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Prismatic Shield
data.description: Increases all resistances of everyone in your group within 100 feet by 252 for 1 hour.

data.name: Radiant Gaze
data.description: Deals 768 Spirit damage over 9 seconds and reduces your target's damage and chance to critically hit by 5%.

data.name: Radiant Lance
data.description: Deals 477 Spirit damage to your target.

data.name: Rain Lord
data.description: Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them have their Intelligence, Strength and Ballistic Skill reduced by 120 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Run Between Worlds
data.description: Reduces the cooldown time for Walk Between Worlds by 50%.

data.name: Scatter The Winds
data.description: Deals 768 Spirit damage to your target over 9 seconds, and causes all heals that they receive to become 50% less effective.

data.name: Searing Touch
data.description: You concentrate on your target for up to 6 seconds, repeatedly dealing  477 Spirit damage to them as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Shield of Saphery
data.note:
Force increases effectiveness.
Builds Tranquility
Target must be in your group or warband.
data.description: Surrounds an ally with a magical barrier for up to 9 seconds which will absorb up to 1387 damage.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Storm of Cronos
data.description: A cone of energy strikes enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away, dealing 475 Spirit damage and reducing their Spirit resistance by 378 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: All of your heals will cause enemy monsters to hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Transfer Force
data.description: Deals 1488 Spirit damage to your target over 24 seconds and heals your defensive target for 150% of the damage done on each tick.

data.name: Transfer Magic
data.description: Drain Magic will now siphon energy from an area 20 feet around your initial target, but will only drain 92 Action Points over 9 seconds from each target.

data.name: Walk Between Worlds
data.description: You can not be set back for 5 seconds and detaunts all enemies around you, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal to you to 50%.

data.name: Wild Healing
data.description: Whenever you critically heal someone, your healing abilities will cost 50% less action points for 10 seconds.

data.name: Wind Blast
data.description: You call forth a powerful gust of wind which slams into enemies within 30 feet of you, knocking players away a medium distance and knocking monsters down.  Anyone hit by the wind becomes snared, reducing their run speed by 20% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Winds' Protection
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet regain 1200 health over 15 seconds, and become surrounded by a magical barrier which will absorb 3600 damage.

data.name: Apotheosis
data.description: Any time you use Cleansing Light on an ally, you will now remove one Hex or Ailment from all groupmates within 50 feet of them.

data.name: Penetrating Siphon
data.description: Balance Essence and Energy of Vaul will now inflict 458 Spirit damage, but no longer receive a base healing value, instead healing for only 50% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Khaine's Touch
data.description: Reduces the duration and tick interval of Searing Touch by 50%. Khaine's price however will reduce the effectiveness of your healing abilities by 20% and increases the cooldown of Searing Touch by 50%.
